name: Payment Against PO
query:
SELECT 
order_no as "Order:Link/Purchase Order:180",
parent as "Reference:Link/Payment Module:150",
supplier as "Supplier:Data:250",
amount as "Amount:Currency:150",
percentage as "Percentage:Data:100",
final_amount as "Final Amount:Currency:150"
FROM `tabAdvance Table` WHERE docstatus=1
